#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int binomialCoeff(int n, int k)
{
    int res = 1;
    if( k>n-k)
        k = n-k;
    for(int i =0;i<k;++i)
    {
        res*=(n-i);
        res/=(i+1);
    }
    return res;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int d,r;
        cin>>d>>r;
        int n = d+r;
        int res = binomialCoeff(n,d);
        cout<<res<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
